attributes.action: People on government benefits should do 3 days a week, 4 hours a day labour.
attributes.additional_details: Enforce the non workers to work to help at least make the country look a better place.
attributes.background: Enforce people on government paid benefits to do work to improve the state of the country. (Including asylum seekers)

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
